name: Waiting for sleep
description:
This is a game about insomnia. I created it for the One Day Jam using the Ren'Py Visual Novel Engine.

To learn more about insomnia and what to do if you suffer from it, check out this link: http://www.mayoclinic.org/diseases-conditions/inso...

The entries for One Day Jam will be sold in a pay-what-you-want bundle and the proceeds will go to Action for Trans Health, which you can learn about at http://actionfortranshealth.org.uk/.

If you are interested in downloading the game, please wait until the bundle is available.
